sub_title: MSc. International Management • Imports & Exports • Operations • Sales & Marketing
summary:
I am a business professional currently pursuing growth and new career opportunities in the Netherlands. My interest on international business arose while working for an Export Management Company which challenged me to interact with different stakeholders and continuously fostered my knowledge on International Trade. my objective is to consciously manage administrative operations in order to reinforce good practices of the companies and deliver the best service to all stakeholders involved. 

Recently graduated from a Master of Science on International Management From Tilburg University. Economist from the Universidad de Los Andes (Colombia) with further studies in Marketing and Strategy. My experience involves launching new brands into Latin American countries, market assessment, data analysis, logistics, sales and marketing. Knowledge in Stata, R, and Microsoft Office Package. 

My fields of expertise and interests: International trade | Cross-country marketing campaigns | Innovation & Sustainability | Logistics | Administrative management | Operations

courses.name: Academic Semester Abroad. EF Chicago  International language schools.
Strategy and Marketing for Emerging Countries – Brazil: economic outlook, Business and employment opportunities. International Business School of Sao Paulo. Universidade Paulista.
Survival Portuguese. International Business School of Sao Paulo. Universidade Paulista

profile_positions.description:
The EquiTrade Group is a full-service international management company, overseeing the export of North American manufactured foodstuff products to Latin America and the Caribbean countries.

As Operations Specialist I provide management support with accounting, administrative and financial information from the company and its customers. Moreover, I issue export documentation and assist health registration process within new markets. Another part of my role is focused on building periodic sales, presence and marketing reports by market, by brand. 

Along with this experience I have been able to contribute to the Improvement of administrative, management and commercial processes of EquiTrade Group, including up-to-date bookkeeping.
profile_positions.title: Operational Specialist

profile_positions.description:
As Regional in-country Manager, my major responsibility was to give support in the development of commercial proposals aiming to launch new products and optimize portfolios among the markets EquiTrade had presence. In addition, my role comprised the verification of compliance with the agreed marketing plans within the markets / supermarket chains.

Along with this experienced I had the chance to collaborate with the introduction of different brands such as Ragú and Bertolli Brands in Colombia, Mexico, Chile, Ecuador, Costa Rica and Panama. As well as J.M. Smucker’s and JIF products in Ecuador. Furthermore, the company experienced an Increase of sales through the implementation of different marketing plans.
profile_positions.title: Regional in-country Manager (Colombia)

profile_positions.description:
As an Intern, my principal duties consisted of promoting the optimization of administrative and daily processes. Assist and support the general Consul during official meetings, mainly with local authorities and diplomatic representatives, and facilitate the visa process for foreigners.

At the end of my internship, there was an improvement on the administrative processes which led to a decrease of users waiting time. Moreover, the electoral process was organized according to central government guidelines and the ties between the General Consulate and the consular corps were strengthened.
profile_positions.title: Intern
